name: Windows Catalog Search Index File
summary: Learn about .HSH files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: HSH files are saved alongside several other index files that together comprise the search index. Other file types include .000, .BK1, .BK2, .PS1, .PS2, and .FID files.

description: System file created by Indexing Service, a component of the Windows operating system used for creating a searchable file system index; commonly created in the C:\​System Volume Information\​catalog.wci\​ directory.
